title: Dark-Candy Fiddlesticks has Surprise Party Fiddlesticks' Ultimate Animation

replies.body:
Hey FIuffCow!

Thanks for the report! Nice catch, this is definitely a spectator issue.

Of course! Let me know if you need an image of it. I just recently was informed by a Rioter that I have to post my image on an image hosting website to actually attach an image of it; I feel so stupid XD.
One step ahead of you - I already have a screen cap. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=rEPP5JU8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-26T18:34:19.997+0000)
>
> Hey FIuffCow!
> 
> Thanks for the report! Nice catch, this is definitely a spectator issue.

Not just a spectator issue. I recently played vs a Dark Candy Fiddlesticks and his ult was replaced with Surprise Party towards the end of the game. 
(He did the typical 'cast ult as enemy is destroying Nexus' bit. So the end Victory! screen may count as spectator mode)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=rEPP5JU8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-26T18:34:19.997+0000)
>
> Hey FIuffCow!
> 
> Thanks for the report! Nice catch, this is definitely a spectator issue.

btw. I remember in one of the patch notes, it mentioned fixing some spectator bugs which are still persistent though. Sometimes the homeguard effect remains on champs in spectator mode. Also, I notice the Nexus turrets like bug out often. Even in game. Their firing sound will persist even when there are no minions to fire at. Slightly annoying, but it's not too bad to deal with. Just a weird bug that happens often.

I made a bot game just to test this. 
Mine was fine, maybe it's just a one game bug.
Keep in mind I was spectating, it's entirely possible it's a bug with spectator mode, as there are a ton of those honestly. But maybe it's just a one-game bug too.
